key.name: show-in-full-screen
key.description: Show the dock while in full screen mode.

key.name: background-opacity
key.description: Opacity, in %, of the dock background, 0 = translucent 100 = solid.

key.name: icons-opacity
key.description: Opacity, in %, of the dock icons, 0 = translucent 100 = solid.

key.name: autohide-delay
key.description: Delay, in milliseconds, before the dock hides after the cursor abandons it.

key.name: toggle-delay
key.description: Delay, in milliseconds, before the dock shows after the cursor reaches the bottom of the screen.

key.name: show-dock-duration
key.description: Duration, in milliseconds, of dock showing animation.

key.name: hide-dock-duration
key.description: Duration, in milliseconds, of dock hiding animation.
